function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of transmission due to shared spaces in housing","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread within households","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to improve ventilation and disinfection in shared spaces","Technologies":"Smart sensors for air quality monitoring, UV disinfection systems","People":"Residents of shared housing, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of proper arrangement of home workspaces","Impact":"Decreased productivity and ergonomic issues for remote workers","Mitigation":"Providing guidelines for home office setup and ergonomic furniture","Technologies":"Remote desk sensors for ergonomic assessment, video conferencing tools for remote consultation","People":"Remote workers, employers","Owner":"Employers, occupational health and safety departments"}]}
